remarks: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for "defined at".  To prove a deduction version of this theorem is not easily possible because many deduction versions for bound-variable hypothesis builder for constructs the definition of "defined at" is based on are not available (e.g. for Fun/Rel, dom, C_, etc.).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
statement:
nfdfat.1 $e |- F/_ x F $.
nfdfat.2 $e |- F/_ x A $.
nfdfat $p |- F/ x F defAt A $.
